reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Finnpartnership: Importing certified organic spices from developing countries to Finland

description.narrative: EU certified organic spices is the business focus of Promotto Spices. The products are directly imported from well organized spice farm cooperatives located in developing countries; for example Wayanad Social Service Society. Current business area is Finla nd. Important clients are hotel and catering sector ingredients provider Heinon Tukku Oy and specialized retail shops of Punnitse ja Säästä Oy. Promotto Spices will have its own webstore. Domain name under construction is www.spices.fi . Brand name 'Spi ces Chef'. Promotto Spices business idea is developed taking advisory services from Yritys-Suomi Josek Oy and Pohjois-Karjala Ely-Keskus. Publications in Finnpartnership website such as CBI market reports has immensely helped in understanding multidimensio nal aspects of the project in question. Promotto Spices has also done extensive research on the supply and demand of organic spice business sector. Promotto Spices will be taking part in relevant events such as Biofach 2016 (Nuremberg Germany) World Spice Congress (2016) India Biofach India (2016) to continuously develop business network as well as to identify possibilities of organic spice business. Business area currently is Finland and in the future re-export from Finland to the whole of Nordic region an d Russia.
